{{Description|Baron Bunny hails from a storied lineage, but Amber has stopped keeping count since Baron Bunny the 893rd.}}
'''Explosive Puppet''' is [[Amber]]'s [[Elemental Skill]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* {{TalentNote|particles|the explosion|4}}
* Upon landing, Baron Bunny dances and performs a total of four 180° turns, which lasts for 8 seconds.<ref>YouTube: [https://youtu.be/JuqF-VlCC40 Amber's Explosive Puppet Tests]</ref> If not detonated prematurely, it will explode after the last flip (facing away from the throwing direction), damaging and launching enemies backward.
** While the skill's cooldown starts immediately, Baron Bunny's 8-second countdown does not start until Baron Bunny lands.
* Baron Bunny can be moved by [[gravity]], collision, attacks, [[Vacuum Field]]s, and combat talents that have the capability to move objects, such as [[Gust Surge]].
* Baron Bunny is able to be frozen, although it will not turn icy and blue like Frozen entities do. Instead, it will emit Cryo particles and stop dancing.
** Because of this, Baron Bunny can also cause [[Swirl]] and [[Elemental Absorption]] with certain Anemo abilities.
* Baron Bunny can be used to activate pressure plates.
